universe_note: Ranked only the provided packets. Liquidity gate applied: all selected names have avg_dollar_volume_20d >= 50,000,000 and price >= 2. Exclusion rule (price up >15% last 5 trading days) could not be verified from packets; not applied and flagged as a data gap per name. Options and social sentiment data not provided in packets; factor score caps applied (options<=3, sentiment<=4).

top5.name: Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Follow-through fails and price loses short-term trend support (e.g., closes back below rising MA20/MA50) or dilution/financing overhang dominates tape.

primary_catalyst.title: JPM Healthcare Conference newsflow + recent regulatory/product updates
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Company-highlighted launch and obesity RNAi data updates at JPM can drive incremental buy-side attention; recent regulatory approval headlines keep near-term newsflow active, supporting a momentum continuation setup.

sources.title: Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Touts Rudemplo Launch, Obesity RNAi Data and $920M Cash at JPM Conference
Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Says Health Canada Issues 'Notice of Compliance' for Redemplo for Triglyceride Disorder

risk_factors: Biotech headline risk: trial/regulatory interpretations can reverse quickly; gap risk elevated.
Dilution/financing overhang (notes/common/pre-funded warrants headline) can cap upside or add volatility.

top5.name: Broadcom Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Breakout attempt fails and price loses short-term moving averages; CES product news fails to translate into forward demand narrative.

primary_catalyst.title: CES 2026 product launch newsflow (Wi‑Fi products)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: New product announcements can reinforce AI/enterprise networking demand narratives and trigger incremental revisions/positioning in a high-liquidity mega-cap capable of fast 10% moves during high-volatility regimes.

sources.title: Broadcom Inc. (AVGO) Launches new Wi-Fi Products at CES 2026
Dow Jones Futures: Nvidia, Tesla, Walmart Are Key Movers; CPI Inflation Report Next

risk_factors: Macro sensitivity: CPI/rates and semis risk-on/off can dominate product news in the short window.
Already near highs; any guidance/AI demand narrative disappointment can cause sharp mean reversion given elevated realized volatility.

top5.name: Sempra

target.bear_case_note: Regulatory decision/charge narrative worsens or is interpreted as structurally negative; price loses trend support despite defensive sector bid.

primary_catalyst.title: Regulatory decision/charge impact update (Track 2 proposed decision)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Regulatory outcomes can re-rate utilities quickly; clarity on earnings impact and allowed returns can trigger a repricing move as investors update forward cash flow expectations.

sources.title: Sempra (SRE) Estimates A $471 million After-Tax Impact To Earnings From Track 2 Proposed Decision
How A US$471 Million Regulatory Charge At Sempra (SRE) Has Changed Its Investment Story

risk_factors: Utilities typically have lower beta; achieving +10% in 7 trading days is less common without a strong positive regulatory surprise.
Regulatory headline risk can cut both ways; negative follow-ups could gap down.

top5.name: Expeditors International of Washington, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Transportation 'recovery' narrative fades; stock fails to hold breakout area and rolls below short-term moving averages.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst upgrade / sector recovery call (BofA transportation)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A high-profile sector upgrade can pull in incremental flows and prompt near-term multiple expansion for freight/logistics names positioned for a cyclical recovery.

sources.title: Will BofA’s Transportation Upgrade Shift Expeditors’ (EXPD) Freight Recovery Narrative?
Transportation Sector Poised for 2026 Recovery After Freight Recession, BofA Says

risk_factors: Macro/PMI and rates can overwhelm transport upgrade narratives in a 1–2 week window.
If freight pricing data points disappoint, the 'recovery' thesis can unwind quickly.

top5.name: Ross Stores, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Overbought momentum (RSI) mean-reverts; price fails to hold recent run-up and breaks below short-term support.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst focus list / price target raise (JPMorgan)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A major bank adding the stock to a focus list and raising target can drive near-term institutional attention and momentum continuation, especially with strong volume expansion.

sources.title: JPMorgan ups Ross Stores target, adds to Analyst Focus List
Deutsche Bank sees ‘risk-on’ setup for retail in 2026, favors AS and ROST

risk_factors: RSI is very elevated (overbought); higher probability of pullback/sideways consolidation.
Retail is sensitive to macro data and consumer sentiment; sector rotation risk is high.
